ControlHintDef.description: PIT Menu Open - Rebinding Input - CANCEL
PIT Menu Open - NAVIGATE/SELECT
QSWheel Open - SELECT INPUT
Vehicle SoftDeath - Has Ejector Seat - EJECT
Helmet Visor Needs Wiping - WIPE VISOR
QTM - Q-Travelling - EXIT QT
QTM - QT Ready To Engage - QT ENGAGE
TunedToJumpPoint + JumpPointClosed + Power_On - Fire to Activate Jump Point
Vehicle Health < 10% or MainThrustersDestroyed - Exits Into Interior - EJECT
Locked Target: Hostile + Guns Equipped + OM:Combat - FIRE
Incoming Missiles - No Decoy - Health < 30% - Has Ejection Seat - EJECT
Remote Turret: RemoteTurret3Available - ENTER REMOTE TURRET
Remote Turret: RemoteTurret2Available - ENTER REMOTE TURRET
Remote Turret: RemoteTurret1Available - ENTER REMOTE TURRET
Docked - UNDOCK
Not Docked - Can Auto Dock - AUTO-DOCK
Current Target: Can Dock With - Not Attacker - TARGET HAIL (for docking)
Near Docking ATC - REQUEST DOCKING
Near Landing ATC - REQUEST LANDING
Ship Has Bombs - Ship in SCM: Missile O.Mode. - Has Bomb Target - DROP BOMB
Ship Has Bombs - Ship in SCM: Missile O.Mode. - Has Bomb Target - DROP BOMB
Ship Has Bombs - Ship in SCM: Missile O.Mode. - No Bomb Target - SET BOMB TARGET
Ship Has Missiles - Ship in SCM: Missile O.Mode. - LAUNCH MISSILE
Scan Mode - SCAN
Salvage Mode - ENGAGE TOOL - CYCLE TOOL
Mining Mode - Power On - FIRE (TOGGLE)
Landing Gear Deployed - Not Landed - Auto Land Ready - AUTOLAND
Locked Target: Hostile - Ship Has Guns - Ship in SCM:Combat - Ship Has gun group 1 & 2 - FIRE (mouse1 & 2)
Locked Target: Hostile - Ship Has Guns - Ship in SCM:Combat - Ship Has gun group 1 - FIRE (mouse1)
Locked Target: Hostile - Ship Has Guns - Ship in SCM:Combat - Ship Has gun group 2 - FIRE (mouse2)
Landing Gear Deployed - Not Landed - In Landing Zone OR scm - Thrusters On - MOVEMENT XY
Power Off OR Landed + Power On + At reserved landed pad - POWER TOGGLE
Base - Any - STAR MAP (Open)
PIT Menu Open - Rebinding Input - BLANK
PIT Menu Open - BACK/EXIT
QSWheel Open - OnHover menu option - RELEASE INPUT (to navigate)
QSWheel Open - OnHover menu RELEASE INPUT (to select)
QSWheel Open - Segment Highlight
Incoming Missiles - Susceptible to Decoy & Noise - Has Decoy & Noise Countermeasures - LAUNCH DECOY/NOISE
Incoming Missiles - Susceptible to Decoy - Has Decoy Countermeasures - Always Show - LAUNCH DECOY
Incoming Missiles - Susceptible to Noise - Has Noise Countermeasures - Always Show - LAUNCH NOISE
Remote Turret: UsingRemoteTurret & MultipleRemoteTurrets - CYCLE REMOTE TURRET
Power + Thrusters On - Landing Gear Down - Resered (landing area) OR Waiting for takeoff - MOVE UP/DOWN
Not Docked - Docking Mode On - DOCKING MODE TOGGLE
Near Landing ATC - MOBIGLASS COMMLINK (Docking Request)
Near Landing ATC - MOBIGLASS COMMLINK (Landing Request)
Ship Has Bombs - Ship in SCM: Missile OM - BOMB CYCLE
Ship Has Missiles - Ship in SCM: Missile OM - MISSILE CYCLE
Salvage Mode - FOCUS TOOL
Thrusters Off - TOGGLE THRUSTERS
Current Select Target: Attacker - No or Friendly Locked Target - LOCK TARGET
Attacker Contacts Present - No Current Hostile Target - LOCK Attacker TARGET
Current Select Target: Hostile - No or Friendly Locked Target - LOCK TARGET
Attacker Contact Soft Select - No Current Attacker or Hostile Target - LOCK ATTACKER TARGET
Hostile Contacts Present - No Current Hostile Target - LOCK HOSTILE TARGET
Scan Mode - SCAN ZOOM
Salvage Mode Available & Power On - TOGGLE SALVAGE MODE
Mining Mode - Power On - POWER THROTTLE
Current Select Target - LOCK TARGET
Power + Thrusters On - Landing Gear Down - MOVE UP/DOWN
Power On - Has Target - Sub-Target Cycle
Power & Thrusters On & SCM Mode Active - SPEED RANGE
Base - Any - PIS/LOOK AROUND
PIT Menu Open - Rebinding Input - BLANK
PIT Menu Open - CONTEXTUAL MENU
PIT Menu Open - PAGE NAVIGATION
PIT Menu Open - CLOSE
QSWheel Open - CANCEL
SoftDeath or MainThrustersDestroyed - Seat exits to exterior - EXIT SHIP
InJumpTunnel + Power_On + Thrusters On - Afterburner
Incoming Missiles - Has Decoy Countermeasures - BURST +/-
Incoming Missiles - Has Decoy Countermeasures - Always Show - DECOY PANIC LAUNCH
Vehicle Health < 10% or SoftDeath or MainThrustersDestroyed - Exits Into Interior - EXIT SEAT
Remote Turret: HasRemoteTurretAccess & UsingRemoteTurret - EXIT REMOTE TURRET
Landing Gear Deployed - Not Landed - Auto Land Ready - BLANK
Quantum Travel Mode - Power On - EXIT Quantum Mode
Ship Has Bombs - Ship in SCM: Missile O.Mode. - Has Bomb Target - CANCEL BOMB TARGET
Ship Has Missiles - Ship in SCM: Missile OM - +MAX MISSILES and RESET MISSILE COUNT
Scan Mode - EXIT SCAN MODE
Salvage Mode - CONVERGENCE SCROLL - CONVERGENCE AXIS
Mining Mode - Power On - Fracture Mode - LASTER TYPE (EXTRACT)
Mining Mode - Power On - Extract Mode - LASTER TYPE (FRACTURE)
Mining Mode - Power On - Always On - EXIT MINING MODE
Ship Has No Missiles - Ship in SCM: Missile O.Mode. - OPERATOR MODE CYCLE
Locked Target: Hostile or Attacker - Ship Has Missiles - Ship in SCM OR - Missile OM + No Missiles - MISSILE MODE
Not Docked - Docking Mode On - DOCKING MODE CAMERA TOGGLE
Not Landed & Out Of Landing Area & Gear Down - Thrusters On - Always On - LANDING GEAR TOGGLE (to raise)
Not Landed & Has Assigned Landing Area & Gear Up - Thrusters On - LANDING GEAR TOGGLE (to lower)
Current Select or Locked Target - No Pinned Targets AND In NAV Mode - PIN TARGET & CHANGE OPERATOR MODE
Current Select or Locked Target - No Pinned Targets - PIN TARGET
Power On - Can QT Travel - Master Mode: NAV - CHANGE OPERATOR MODE
Power_On + HasJumpDrive + HasLinkedJumpPoint + SCM - Use QT to see JDRV UI
Power On - In NAV Mode - CHANGE OPERATOR MODE
Power On - Can QT Travel - Master Mode: SCM - CHANGE MASTER MODE
Power & Thrusters On & SCM Mode Active & Accelerating - AFTERBURN
Not Accelerating - Seat Exits to Interior - EXIT SEAT
Power On - Engines On - NeedTakeOffPermission - Always Show - CALL ATC
Landed - Power Off or Thrusters Off - Seat exits to interior - EXIT SEAT
Landed - Power Off or Thrusters Off - Seat exits to exterior - EXIT SHIP
In Precision Targeting (ADS) Mode - Power & Thrusters On - Always Show - ADS
In Decoupled Mode ON - Power & Thrusters On - Always Show - DECOUPLE TOGGLE
In Cruise Control Mode ON - Power & Thrusters On - Always Show - CRUISE CONTROL TOGGLE
***:( *** G-Force Safety OFF - Power & Thrusters On - Always Show - G-FORCE SAFETY TOGGLE *** G-Safe_On check always false = DISABLED
Rotation Lock ON - Power & Thrusters On - Always Show - ROTATION LOCK TOGGLE
Volatile Cargo - Always Show - JETTISON
